snippets.heading: learnText
snippets.text_en: Read an article about blockchain in Swahili.
snippets.text_sw: Soma makala kuhusu blockchain kwa lugha ya Kiswahili.

snippets.heading: quizText
snippets.text_en: Answer a multiple-choice question about the article.
snippets.text_sw: Jibu swali la chaguo nyingi kuhusu makala.

snippets.heading: earnText
snippets.text_en: Once you pass the quiz, you earn ada (cryptocurrency). Complete lessons to earn NFT bonuses!
snippets.text_sw: Mara tu unapopita jaribio, unapata ada (sarafu ya crypto). Kamilisha masomo ili upate NFT za ziada!
